resources.string: Provide a time interval for which the phone will periodically lock. Select a time unit (seconds/minutes/hours) and input a time value.

Minimum time values: 
 • 20 seconds 
 • 1 minute 
 • 1 hour 

 Maximum time values (equals to 1 day): 
 • 86400 seconds 
 • 1440 minutes 
 • 24 hours


Inputs that are lesser/greater than the min/max values will be overwritten with the min/max values.

Toggle ON to start up the periodic locking service. A notification will appear to display the time when the screen will lock. The service will continue to run even when the app is closed. Upon unlocking the screen, the next locking time will be set and displayed in the notification. Toggle OFF to stop the service.

This feature will prevent unauthorized users from turning off the periodic locking service. Toggle ON to require keyguard authentication when attempting to toggle OFF the locking service. Attempting to toggle OFF this secure mode will also require keyguard authentication. If the phone has no unlock credentials set, then this feature cannot be enabled.
